program.name: python -m ep_bolfi.kadi_tools.convert_csv_to_parquet
program.description: Please refer to the --help output of this file.

param.description: Persistent record identifier where the input data is stored.
param.name: input-record

param.description: Persistent record identifier where the results get stored.
param.name: output-record

param.description: Compression level setting for the compression algorithm Zstandard. -7 is fastest and largest, while 22 ist slowest and smallest. Note that decompression has the same (fast) speed at any level.
param.name: compression-level

param.description: Number of comment lines to trim at the start of the file. This excludes an optional column header line, in contrast to 'ep_bolfi.kadi_tools.read_csv_datasets'. The contents will be dumped in a file separate from the Parquet file.
param.name: comment-lines

param.description: Column delimiter used in the file.
param.name: delimiter

param.description: Decimal symbol used in the file.
param.name: decimal

param.description: Whether or not an already existing file by the same name in the record gets overwritten.
param.name: overwrite
